attributes.action: The unions need to grow up get a sense of proprtion and a sense of humour
attributes.additional_details:
That the unison union saw fit to threaten legal action for the remarks Jeremy Clarkson made on the one show, and the leader of the opposition endorsing their faux outrage shows a lack of perspective and a singular lack of a sense of humour.
 The government should continue as the Prime ministers spokeman did yesterday to make tongue in cheek ripostes to tongue in cheek remarks
